long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Affilae's Google Chrome extension allow you easily generate tracking links for your affiliate partnerships.


★ KEY FEATURES ★

➤ Deeplink generator
➤ URL shortener
➤ Custom parameters and SubID
➤ Sharable links on Facebook, Twitter


★ HOW TO USE? ★

➊ Go the brand website or directly on a product page where you would like to create beautiful tracking links
➋ Click on the Affilae extension (Chrome toolbar)
➌ Connect your Affilae affiliate profile (same login details), or create a new publisher account: https://app.affilae.com/en/publisher-signup
➍ Start to create, shortener and share your affiliate links!
